greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of sqrt(2 - sqrt(3)), edge length of a regular dodecagon with circumradius 1.
comment: sqrt(2 - sqrt(3)) is the shape of the lesser sqrt(6)-contraction rectangle, as defined at A188739. - _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 16 2011
This is a constructible number, since 12-gon is a constructible polygon. See A003401 for more details. - _Stanislav Sykora_, May 02 2016
It is also smaller positive coordinate of (symmetrical) intersection points of x^2 + y^2 = 4 circle and y = 1/x hyperbola. The bigger coordinate is A188887. - _Leszek Lezniak_, Sep 18 2018
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
results.author: Jun Mizuki (suzuki32(AT)sanken.osaka-u.ac.jp), Jan 25 2005
